item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p> <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJN/$FILE/cool.gif"</a>> Dad and I used to visit friends who lived only minutes away from the Minnack - fabulous, isn't it? Glad the weather is holding up for you.<br/><br/><br/><br/>We will all go up on the train with you on Sunday - do you know the time etc? Email or give me a ring</p>
item.content:encoded:
http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJN/$FILE/cool.gif“> Dad and I used to visit friends who lived only minutes away from the Minnack – fabulous, isn’t it? Glad the weather is holding up for you.

We will all go up on the train with you on Sunday – do you know the time etc? Email or give me a ring
